org.apache.juneau.http

Class BasicHttpResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.entity.AbstractHttpEntity
      • org.apache.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity
        • org.apache.juneau.http.BasicHttpEntity
          • org.apache.juneau.http.BasicHttpResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpEntity, HttpResource

    public class BasicHttpResource
extends BasicHttpEntity
implements HttpResource
    An extension of an HttpEntity with support for arbitrary headers. Provides the following features:
    • Default support for various streams and readers.
    • Content from Suppliers.
    • Caching.
    • Fluent setters.
    • Fluent assertions.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicHttpResource

        public BasicHttpResource(Object content)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        content - The content.
        Can be any of the following:
        • InputStream
        • Reader - Converted to UTF-8 bytes.
        • File
        • CharSequence - Converted to UTF-8 bytes.
        • byte[].
        • A Supplier of anything on this list.

    contentType - The content type of the contents.
    Can be null.

    public BasicHttpResource header(String name,

    Header is not added if name or value is null.

    Parameters:

    val - The header value.

  • chunked

    public BasicHttpResource chunked()
    Description copied from class: BasicHttpEntity
    Shortcut for calling AbstractHttpEntity.setChunked(boolean) with true.
    • If the BasicHttpEntity.getContentLength() method returns a negative value, the HttpClient code will always use chunked encoding.
    Overrides:
    chunked in class BasicHttpEntity
    Returns:
    This object (for method chaining).
